sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Hebrew: קריאת המלחמה לצדק היתה רחבה - הרבה למגרין של השלטונות.
backtrans: Reading the war to justice was broad - a lot to the Marine of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Hebrew: החלטת המשטר יכה את סדר היום הבסיסי.
backtrans: The regime decision will hit the basic agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Hebrew: הקהילה היתה חרדה על פניו של הרפורמות הנחוצות.
backtrans: The community was anxious on the face of the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Hebrew: הטנק חשיבה פרסם נייר המתאר את התנצלותם של עונש הון.
backtrans: The tank thinking published a paper that describes the apology of capital punishment.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: A nation remained attacked by the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Hebrew: הנשיא הטיף את השרים שלו להתגלגל כתמיכת האופוזיציה המרכזית לתוכניתו הכלכלית עמדו באבזם.
backtrans: The president preached his ministers to roll as a support of the central opposition to his economic program stood in buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Hebrew: הבוחרים היו גלויים כדי לראות את הצעת החוק עברה.
backtrans: The voters were visible to see the bill passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Hebrew: קריאת הדיסוקים של עורך הדין התנודדה למושבעים.
backtrans: The lawyer's dissociation of the lawyer swayed.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Hebrew: בלוק האיחוד האירופי התנגד להטיל בסופו של דבר של אמצעים אנטי-השלכה.
backtrans: The EU block opposed to ultimately impose anti-projection measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Hebrew: הספד פולסום נמסר על ידי היועץ הערמומי.
backtrans: The Fulfa Eulogy was delivered by the cunning consultant.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Hebrew: סוכנות GIG -כלכלה החליטה לקשן את החזרים!
backtrans: Gig Agency - Economy has decided to bring the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Hebrew: חברי התנועה המהפכנית האנטי-תיאוקרטית הפילו את עמיתים בכוח!
backtrans: Members of the anti -ocratic revolutionary movement dropped peers by force!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Hebrew: הבוגדים החליטו מאכזב להילחם עם הקולוניאליסטים.
backtrans: The traitors decided disappointing to fight with colonialists.
